casebody.data:
RIPLEY v. SMITH et al. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. November 28, 1906.) Appeal from Trial Term, Kings County. Action by David Ripley against James A. Smith and others. Erom a judgment for plaintiff, defendant Patrick Skelly appeals. Affirmed.

Argued before HIRSCHBERG, P. J., and WOODWARD, HOOKER, RICH, and MILLER, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, on the authority of Tinsley v. Smith (decided herewith) 101 N. Y. Supp. 382.
